attributes.action: Make paper recycling compulsory for all schools
attributes.additional_details: Every day schools get through masses of paper, and yet in the schools i've seen, this is simply thrown away; wasted. I propose that this is not wasted and recycled making sure that we keep this worlds resources sustainable as what is currently going on is disgusting, and not only is it wasting a huge amount of energy, but destroying habitat and contributing  to climate change.
